name: lambda-logger-extension
description: Lambda Extension that adds logs to already deployed Lambda

scripts.bundle-extension: rm -rf dist && esbuild --sourcemap --bundle --format=cjs --platform=node --sourcemap ./src/logger.ts --outdir=./dist/nodejs/node_modules && cp ./src/logger ./dist/ && cd dist && zip -r extension.zip .
scripts.deploy-extension: npm run bundle-extension && npm run copy-to-s3
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-s3 && npm run deploy-extension
